tables.name: stride_block_events
tables.description: This table provides information about the events occurring on the blockchain within the Cosmos ecosystem, offering insights into the block height, timestamp, and event occurrences. The data is sourced from the blockchain to provide a comprehensive view of the network's activity.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block within the blockchain, representing the number of blocks mined up to this point.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was mined, indicating the time at which the events occurred.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the block, identifying its position in the list of events.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred, categorizing the type of action or transaction.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Additional attributes associated with the event, providing more detailed information about the occurrence.

columns.name: source
columns.description: The source of the data, indicating the blockchain or network from which the information was obtained.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system, indicating the time at which the data was received.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to describe the structure of the data, ensuring consistency and compatibility.

tables.name: stride_blocks
tables.description: Cosmos Blockchain Blocks Dataset: This dataset contains information about blocks in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into network activity and block production. It includes data on block height, timestamp, and other key metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was produced.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: The address of the validator that proposed the block.

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: A hash of the validators involved in the block production process.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block data was ingested into the dataset.

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: The total size of the messages included in the block, in bytes.

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: The total number of transactions included in the block.

tables.name: stride_celestia_tvl
tables.description: This table displays the total value locked (TVL) in the Celestia network, providing insights into the ecosystem's growth and user activity. It tracks the cumulative amount of tokens and their corresponding USD value over time.

columns.name: date
columns.description: Date of the data point in the format YYYY-MM-DD

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Denomination of the token, representing the unit of account on the blockchain

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: Total amount of tokens in the denomination specified by token_denom

columns.name: amount_usd
columns.description: Total value of the tokens in USD, calculated based on market rates

tables.name: stride_conversion_rates
tables.description: This table contains the latest conversion rates between different token denominations in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insight into the real-time exchange values of various blockchain-based assets.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The date of the conversion rate data, represented as a string in YYYY-MM-DD format.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The base token denomination being converted from, such as ATOM, UST, or other Cosmos-issued assets.

columns.name: liquid_token_denom
columns.description: The token denomination being converted to, which is typically a stablecoin or a cryptocurrency with high liquidity.

columns.name: conversion_rate
columns.description: The exchange rate between the base token and the liquid token, represented as a decimal value.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the conversion rate data was ingested into the system, represented as a Unix timestamp in seconds.

tables.name: stride_delegate
tables.description: This table contains information about transactions and actions on the Cosmos blockchain, specifically related to validators and token transfers. It provides a detailed breakdown of each transaction, including sender and recipient information.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block at which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block at which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator that processed the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred during the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred during the transaction.

columns.name: new_shares
columns.description: The new shares allocated to the sender as a result of the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: stride_ics20_receive
tables.description: This table captures receiving ICS-20 token transfers within the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into the flow of tokens between accounts.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction occurred

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the ICS-20 message within the transaction

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the ICS-20 message

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account that initiated the token transfer

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The account that received the token transfer

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred (e.g., ATOM)

columns.name: token_path
columns.description: The path of the tokens transferred (e.g., uusd/ibc/BF4F...)

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Any additional information included with the token transfer

columns.name: src_channel
columns.description: The source channel of the ICS-20 transfer

columns.name: dst_channel
columns.description: The destination channel of the ICS-20 transfer

columns.name: connection
columns.description: The connection ID of the channel

columns.name: sequence
columns.description: The sequence number of the token transfer

columns.name: ack
columns.description: The acknowledgement of the token transfer

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system

tables.name: stride_ics20_transfer
tables.description: This table contains records of token transfers between connections within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the flow of assets across the network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transfer was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction containing the transfer.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transfer within the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction, which contains the transfer.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message, which contains the transfer.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account transferring the tokens.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address of the account receiving the tokens.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred.

columns.name: token_path
columns.description: The path of the tokens transferred, representing their composition and hierarchy.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Any additional information or comments associated with the transfer.

columns.name: src_channel
columns.description: The source channel of the transfer.

columns.name: dst_channel
columns.description: The destination channel of the transfer.

columns.name: connection
columns.description: The connection through which the transfer occurred.

columns.name: sequence
columns.description: The sequence number of the transfer, indicating its position within the channel.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the transfer was ingested into the database.

tables.name: stride_liquid_stake
tables.description: This dataset provides information on liquid staking in the Cosmos ecosystem, including token transactions and balances. It offers insights into the liquidity of various tokens within the ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction, used to track its execution on the blockchain.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction message in the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the transaction message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account address that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred or staked in the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred or staked in the transaction.

columns.name: liquid_token_amount
columns.description: The amount of liquid tokens staked in the transaction.

columns.name: liquid_token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the liquid tokens staked in the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the transaction data was ingested into the dataset.

tables.name: stride_liquid_unstake
tables.description: This table provides information on liquid unstaking events in the Cosmos ecosystem, offering insights into the tokens being unstaked and the associated transactions.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the unstaking event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the unstaking event occurred on the blockchain.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that triggered the unstaking event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block in which the unstaking event occurred.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction that triggered the unstaking event.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message that triggered the unstaking event.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account that initiated the unstaking event.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The quantity of tokens being unstaked.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens being unstaked (e.g., uatom for Cosmos ATOM).

columns.name: liquid_token_amount
columns.description: The quantity of liquid tokens being unstaked.

columns.name: liquid_token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the liquid tokens being unstaked (e.g., uatom for Cosmos ATOM).

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: stride_message_events
tables.description: This table contains a comprehensive log of all blockchain events within the Cosmos ecosystem, capturing key aspects of block, transaction, and message processing. The data is sourced from various Cosmos-based blockchains, providing a unified view of the network's activity.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the event was processed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was processed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that triggered the event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the message.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred (e.g., creation, execution, deletion).

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: A JSON object containing additional attributes of the event.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the event data was ingested into the system.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to store the event data.

tables.name: stride_redelegate
tables.description: This table provides information on validator redelegations in the Cosmos ecosystem. It includes the block height and timestamp when the redelegation occurred, along with the sender and recipient validators, and the amount of tokens redelegated.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height at which the redelegation was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the redelegation was recorded.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that initiated the redelegation.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The validator that initiated the redelegation.

columns.name: src_validator
columns.description: The validator that the tokens were redelegated from.

columns.name: dst_validator
columns.description: The validator that the tokens were redelegated to.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens redelegated.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens redelegated.

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: The timestamp when the redelegation was completed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the redelegation data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: stride_send
tables.description: Cosmos Blockchain Transactions: A collection of transaction data from various Cosmos chains, providing insights into token movements and interactions.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height of the transaction within the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction was processed within the blockchain.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction, representing the hash of the transaction data.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block, indicating its position.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction, representing its position.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message, indicating its position.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the entity that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address of the entity that received the tokens or executed the action.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred during the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred during the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: stride_transactions
tables.description: This table contains a comprehensive collection of transaction data from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the blockchain's activity and behavior.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block within which the transaction was committed.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the specific Cosmos blockchain network.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Detailed information about the transaction, including its type and parameters.

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: A human-readable message describing the outcome of the transaction.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The amount of coins paid by the sender as a transaction fee.

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: The return code of the transaction, indicating its success or failure.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: The total amount of gas consumed by the transaction.

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: The amount of gas requested by the sender to execute the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction was ingested into the blockchain.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: A note or comment left by the sender or receiver of the transaction.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the transaction schema used to validate the transaction.

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: The coins used to pay the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: The account that granted the funds to pay the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: The account that paid the transaction fee.

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: The maximum amount of gas that can be consumed by the transaction.

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: A flag indicating whether the transaction was executed in single-sign mode.

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: JSON data containing information about the multi-signature transaction.

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: The height of the block at which the transaction will timeout if not executed.

tables.name: stride_undelegate
tables.description: Undelegate operations on the Cosmos blockchain, providing insights into validators and token transfers. This data is extracted from the blockchain, offering a transparent view of the network's activity.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height at which the undelegate operation was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block at which the undelegate operation was recorded.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction containing the undelegate operation.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block containing the undelegate operation.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction containing the undelegate operation.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action in the message containing the undelegate operation.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account address that initiated the undelegate operation.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator address of the account that initiated the undelegate operation.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens undelegated from the validator.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens undelegated from the validator.

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: The time at which the undelegate operation was completed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: stride_withdraw_delegator_rewards
tables.description: Cosmos Delegator Withdrawal Rewards: This table contains information about Cosmos network delegator withdrawal rewards. It provides insights into the transactions and validators involved in these rewards.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action in the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator that processed the transaction and earned the reward.

columns.name: reward
columns.description: The amount of tokens or coins awarded to the validator as a reward.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: stride_yield
tables.description: This table provides information on the yield generated by validators in the Cosmos ecosystem. It offers insights into the rewards earned by validators for participating in the network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the yield was generated.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was generated.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction in which the yield was generated.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within a transaction in which the yield was generated.

columns.name: nth_action
columns.description: The specific action (e.g., delegation, redelegation, unbonding) that generated the yield.

columns.name: rewards_address
columns.description: The address of the validator that earned the yield.

columns.name: asset
columns.description: The type of asset (e.g., ATOM, BNB, KSM) for which the yield was generated.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The amount of the yield earned in the native currency of the asset.

columns.name: amount_usd
columns.description: The amount of the yield earned in USD, converted from the native currency of the asset.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the yield data was ingested into the database.
